rooms.description: Small entry hall with open plan layout leading to living and dining area.
Spacious living room with Kerala-style woodwork and traditional motifs; ideal for relaxation.
Adjacent to the living area, designed with traditional stone and wood finishes.
Functional kitchen integrating modern appliances with Kerala architectural elements.
Small yet comfortable space for household staff; includes a small private bathroom.
Well-equipped gym area designed to maximize natural light and ventilation, with mirrored walls and soundproofing as per local norms.
Master bathroom adjoining the living space; designed with modern fixtures integrated with traditional aesthetics.
Dedicated storage area for personal belongings and seasonal items.

openings.description: Traditional Kerala-style door with carved woodwork; ensures auspicious entry as per Vastu.
Large windows placed strategically to maximize natural light and ventilation while maintaining privacy, in line with local building norms.

levels.notes: This floor plan is a penthouse 1BHK design on a 40x60 feet plot. The layout integrates traditional Kerala Nalukettu style elements with modern amenities like a private gym. The servant's quarters are included to provide for household staff, and the bachelor pad design ensures comfort and convenience while adhering to local building norms and Vastu principles.
